/* Standard stuff for everything */
.btn-social {
  color: #FFF;
  border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

/* Facebook */
.btn-facebook {
  background-color: #30487B;
}
.btn-facebook:hover {
  color: #FFF;
  background-color: #3B5998;
}

}

}
